scroll-top.description: At the current scroll height, the custom component cannot obtain the scrollbar event, so it depends on the access party to pass in the event
scroll-top.description_zh: 当前滚动高度，自定义组件无法获得滚动条事件，所以依赖接入方传入

z-index.description: The level at which the anchor is raised

sticky.description: Whether to turn on the anchor point automatic ceiling
sticky.description_zh: 是否开启锚点自动吸顶

offset-top.description: The distance between the anchor point and the top when the ceiling is automatically raised, in rpx, is described in the "Customize the Navigation Bar" above
offset-top.description_zh: 锚点自动吸顶时与顶部的距离，单位rpx，见上方"自定义导航栏"说明

active-color.description: The anchor and right index characters are highlighted in color
active-color.description_zh: 锚点和右边索引字符高亮颜色

events.name: select
events.description: Triggers when the index character on the right is selected
events.description_zh: 选中右边索引字符时触发
